meanings.definition: An object or collection of objects wrapped in paper or other material and tied up for carrying or posting.
meanings.sent1: I received a parcel from my friend with a birthday gift inside.
meanings.sent2: The postman delivered several parcels to our doorstep today.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat played with the parcel, unraveling the wrapping paper.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a beautifully wrapped parcel, full of surprises.
meanings.sent5: The parcel was so big that it barely fit through the mailbox slot.

meanings.definition: A quantity or amount of something, especially food, that is packaged and sent or delivered.
meanings.sent1: The farmer sent us a parcel of fresh vegetables from his garden.
meanings.sent2: We ordered a parcel of sushi for our family dinner.
meanings.sent3: The parcel of cookies disappeared within minutes at the party.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was a delightful parcel of joy in the room.
meanings.sent5: The parcel of candies was a sweet surprise for the children.
